mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, member_id, game_no, added_date) VALUES (cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{gameNo}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, g.game_title AS gameTitle, g.game_price AS gamePrice, gI.attachment_no AS attachmentNo FROM cart c JOIN game g ON c.game_no = g.game_no -- gameNo로 연결 LEFT JOIN game_image gI ON g.game_no = gI.game_no -- gameNo로 연결 WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}
